name: Baseball ”Stan the Man’ Musial
description: “Stan the Man” Musial was one of the greatest baseball players of all time and played for the St. Louis Cardinals for 22 years. The original painting was commissioned for a sports bar in St. Louis, Mo.  Here is a quote from Musial which could be changed to mean the same thing as how I feel about painting: “ … we didn't think about money as much. We enjoyed playing the game. We loved baseball.”  I can say the same thing about painting, “I don’t think much about money.  I enjoy creating art.  I Love to paint”
